scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run webpack && npm run copy-libs-to-public
scripts.compile: npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:esm
scripts.compile:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.json --target es5 --module commonjs --outDir src/cjs/ && npm run copy-src-to-public
scripts.compile:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.json --target ES2015 --module ESNext --outdir src/esm/ --moduleResolution node
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:dev && npm run webpack:prod
scripts.webpack:dev: npx webpack --env=development --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-dist-to-public
scripts.webpack:prod: npx webpack --env=production --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-dist-to-public
scripts.copy-libs-to-public: cp node_modules/three/build/three.min.js public/lib/three/build/three.min.js && cp -R node_modules/plotboilerplate/src/* public/lib/plotboilerplate/src && cp -R node_modules/plotboilerplate/dist/* public/lib/plotboilerplate/dist && cp -R node_modules/earcut-typescript/dist public/lib/earcut-typescript && cp -R node_modules/threejs-slice-geometry-typescript/build public/lib/threejs-slice-geometry-typescript
